title: Physical Volcanology
description: This class examines the dynamics and thermodynamics of planetary volcanism.  The course material covers the generation and transport of magma in the mantle and crust, and the fluid dynamics of eruptions and their impact on the landscape and atmosphere.  Credit not allowed for both EAS 6331 and EAS 4331.
